example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لم)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:J تكد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تبلغ) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:1S ني)) (NP-SBJ (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الصدمة) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM البيضاء))) (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ حتى) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS أردف) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PUNC :) (S (PUNC ") (PP-PRD (PREP من) (NP (ADJP (ADJ_NUM+CASE_DEF_GEN اول) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN واجبات) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الأرمن)))))) (PUNC ,) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:SJ يعملوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN لبنانية) (NP (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_GEN لبنان))))))) (PUNC ")))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: Of the first duties of the Armenians to work to make Lebanon Lebanese

example.arg: من أول واجبات الأرمن أن يعملوا للبنانية لبنان
